thread.title: Ellen DeGeneres' sweet message for Deepika Padukone is hard to miss!
thread.title_full: Ellen DeGeneres' sweet message for Deepika Padukone is hard to miss!

author: Karishma Shetty
title: Ellen DeGeneres' sweet message for Deepika Padukone is hard to miss!
text:
January 30, 2017 Karishma Shetty 11712 reads 9 comments Deepika Padukone recently appeared on The Ellen Show where she made the now infamous comment about having babies with her xXx: Return of Xander Cage co-star, Vin Diesel. 
Ellen turned 59 on January 26, 2017 and DP wished the talk show host on Twitter with a sweet message. 

— Deepika Padukone (@deepikapadukone) January 27, 2017 
Her caption reads, "Happy Happy Birthday you amazing person! @TheEllenShow". 
Ellen took to Twitter to reply to Deepika with a message of her own. 

— Ellen DeGeneres (@TheEllenShow) January 30, 2017 Her caption reads, " I just saw this! Thanks Deepika! Sending love to you and Vin.". Meanwhile, on the work, Deepika will next be seen in Sanjay Leela Bhansali opposite Ranveer Singh and Shahid Kapoor. The movie is slated to release on November 17, 2017 .
